name: Sundown
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Best buds Logan and Blake jet to exotic Puerto Vallarta over spring break hoping to hook up with their crushes. But after Logan meets a local beauty named Gaby, he awakens to find he's minus a valuable watch. Suddenly, the bros are plunged into a wild underworld of gangstas, strip clubs, and high-speed chases in this hilarious, action-packed adventure featuring the smallest bikinis, tightest bodies, top DJs, and hottest beats on the planet.
about_the_game: Best buds Logan and Blake jet to exotic Puerto Vallarta over spring break hoping to hook up with their crushes. But after Logan meets a local beauty named Gaby, he awakens to find he's minus a valuable watch. Suddenly, the bros are plunged into a wild underworld of gangstas, strip clubs, and high-speed chases in this hilarious, action-packed adventure featuring the smallest bikinis, tightest bodies, top DJs, and hottest beats on the planet.
short_description: When best buds Logan & Blake jet to exotic Puerto Vallarta for spring break, they find themselves in tequila heaven—and big trouble—in this hilarious, action-packed comedy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
